channel.title: business on babble
channel.description: Recent content in business on babble

item.title: 025 - Random I
item.description: This word vomit has no topic because there’s nothing obvious on my mind that I want to write about, but I haven’t written one in days and so I feel the need to get back to it. I’m kind of settling into my “explore” phase. I wrote about this a few entries back, but basically I want to spend some time looking for the next fulfilling thing to do with my life.
